resources.string: Nigerian candidates wishing to apply should possess a minimum of five credit passes in the relevant subjects (including English and Mathematics) for the course of their choice at not more than two sittings in SSCE or its equivalent.

Candidates applying to NTNU are required to sit for the current year"\u0027"s Joint Admission and Matriculation Examination (JAMB) and attain the prescribed cut-off mark. They are also expected to complete the NTNU application form. return to the admission office either by person,email or by courier.
Application forms can be obtained online www.ntnu.edu.ng ,at the "Downloads" module in this mobile app,at the school office or any of the Nigerian Turkish International Colleges offices nationwide.
Candidates who did not choose NTNU as either first or second choice during registration for JAMB can also apply to NTNU by obtaining or filling the NTNU application form.
Direct entry and transfer candidates can also apply.
Direct entry and transfer candidates can also apply.
